name: Shooter on a Budget
description:
Press the full screen button for optimal gameplay! Some stuff might get unaligned if played on an unsupported aspect ratio.

A shooter game about  shooting enemies,  taking financial risks, managing your budget and a somewhat absurd amount of ATM machines. 

You play as "Budgit", a robot that runs on coins. Your mission is to defeat the boss hidden deep within one of the dungeons in this open world game. But watch out, almost everything you do costs money. Run out of money in your wallet and it's game over (unless you have a credit card ... ). 

Controls: WASD to move, mouse to aim/shoot, number keys to swap weapons, spacebar to dash.

Created for the Ludum Dare 44 Game Jam with the theme "Your life is currency".

Thank you for trying our game out and make sure to rate and leave a comment!

Slight update: Rebalanced coins/prices a bit and fixed a scenario where the boss sometimes gets stuck on a wall making the game unbeatable.
